body_html:
Same problem: "Error importing tensorflow. Unless you are using bazel,
you should not try to import tensorflow from its source directory;
please exit the tensorflow source tree, and relaunch your python interpreter"

Tried building from source, installing through pip. All the same. I will just move to theano

body:
Same problem: "Error importing tensorflow. Unless you are using bazel,
you should not try to import tensorflow from its source directory;
please exit the tensorflow source tree, and relaunch your python interpreter"

Tried building from source, installing through pip. All the same. I will just move to theano
